name: Roll Credits (matt08-prog)
description:
Controls

move - arrow keys

jump - spacebar

groundpound - down arrow while in the air

The Story So Far

You've just finished a very ... "interesting" game.  At least you think it was a game. The experimental indie title was a bit too niche for your taste. A friend of yours did say that staying until after the credits leads to a fun surprise, however.  So why not stick around just a little while longer?

Hint

groundpound (down arrow while in the air) on the gold blocks to improve your score.

Either play in the browser or download and extract the Windows build below.
